video_prompt: A brilliant white energy burst radiates outwards, sending tentacle-like streaks across the darkening sky. Lightning flashes violently amidst swirling clouds. The colossal, horned figure's long white hair cascades, his flowing garment billowing around him. A key leader raises a glowing, spiky halo, channeling its pulsating energy towards the towering god. The army below gazes upwards as the reflective ground shimmers with shifting light.
image_prompt:
Here are a few options, varying slightly in length and emphasis:

**Option 1 (Most Concise):**

> An epic, awe-inspiring fantasy scene in a colossal, otherworldly cosmic temple, dominated by cool blue and white tones. Above, a brilliant, star-like burst of pure white energy radiates with tentacle-like streaks across a deep indigo sky, punctuated by dramatic lightning. An enormous, god-like male figure with long white hair and large ram horns towers in the mid-ground, powerfully muscular, bare-chested, and wearing a flowing white skirt, gazing down enigmatically. Below, an army of smaller, horned male figures in dark armor and flowing skirts gaze upwards in reverence. In the central foreground, a leader figure, seen from behind on a raised platform, raises a glowing, spiky circular halo or ring towards the giant, channeling energy. Dramatic lighting, mystical atmosphere, high fantasy art style.

**Option 2 (Slightly more descriptive):**

> Generate a grand fantasy image with cool blue and white tones, set in a colossal, otherworldly cosmic temple. At the top, a brilliant, star-like burst of white energy radiates tentacle-like light streaks across a deep indigo sky, with lightning flashing. Dominating the mid-ground is an enormous, god-like male figure with long white hair and ram horns, muscular and bare-chested, wearing a flowing white skirt, looking down. In the foreground, an army of smaller, horned men in dark armor looks up. Central in the foreground, a leader figure, seen from behind, stands on a rocky platform, raising a glowing, spiky circular halo or ring to channel energy towards the giant. Mystical, high fantasy, dramatic lighting.

**Option 3 (Focus on key visual hierarchy):**

> Colossal cosmic temple, cool blue and white fantasy art. Top: Radiant white starburst energy with light tentacles, deep indigo sky, lightning. Mid-ground: Towering, god-like male figure with long white hair, ram horns, muscular, white flowing skirt, enigmatic gaze. Foreground: Army of horned men in dark armor looking up. Central foreground: Leader figure (back to viewer) on platform, raising glowing, spiky halo/ring, channeling power towards the giant. Dramatic, mystical, awe-inspiring.

Choose the one that best fits the specific model's token limit and your preference for detail versus brevity. Option 1 is generally a good balance.
